snippet.title: Yars Rising - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Hack your destiny. Atari and WayForward are proud to unveil a brand new metroidvania in the Yars universe. Play as young hacker, Emi Kimura, as she explores the mysterious mega corporation, QoTech. Yars Rising is coming soon! 

Wishlist Yars Rising: https://link.atari.com/wishlist-yars 

Join the conversation on Discord: https://link.atari.com/discord

Follow Atari
Twitter: https://twitter.com/atari
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/atari
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/atari/
